The Court nonetheless finds fault with a scheme that “automatically”
distributes 20 points to minority applicants because “the only considera-
tion that accompanies this distribution of points is a factual review of an
application  to  determine  whether  an  individual  is  a  member  of  one  of
these minority groups.” The objection goes to the use of points to quantify
and compare characteristics, or to the number of poi
